name: Smashed Broccoli
description: Crispy, cheesy, and full of flavour. This is broccoli for people who don’t like broccoli. Even the pickiest eaters will be converted! Quick and easy, this family-friendly side dish is in the oven in just 5 minutes.
preparation: Preheat oven to 425° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
Place broccoli into Multipurpose Steamer. Cover and microwave on high 3 min, or until tender.
Transfer to pan and arrange in a single layer. Using the base of a measuring cup or glass, flatten broccoli into rounds.
In a small bowl, combine seasoning and oil. Brush over broccoli. Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake 15 min, or until cheese is golden.
tips: Try with your favourite shredded cheeses, such as asiago, mozzarella, or cheddar.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 1⁄2 cup of mashed potatoes.
